verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁתַּ֔יִם <S%H8147><s%> In the second לְיוֹאָ֥שׁ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son יוֹאָחָ֖ז <S%H3099><s%> of Jehoahaz מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מָלַ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אֲמַצְיָ֥הוּ <S%H558><s%> Amaziah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> He was twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <S%H8672><s%> and nine שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's [יְהֹועַדִּין כ] (יְהֹֽועַדָּ֖ן <S%H3086><s%> Jehoaddan ק) מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הַיָּשָׁר֙ <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD רַ֕ק <S%H7535><s%> yet לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> like כְּדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> not like David אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father כְּכֹ֧ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he עָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> he did יוֹאָ֥שׁ <S%H3101><s%> according to all things as Joash אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> did

רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> but הַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> Howbeit the high places לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not סָ֑רוּ <S%H5493><s%> were not taken away ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> as yet הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> the people מְזַבְּחִ֥ים <S%H2076><s%> did sacrifice וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <S%H6999><s%> and burnt incense בַּבָּמֽוֹת׃ <S%H1116><s%> on the high places

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after חָזְקָ֥ה <S%H2388><s%> was confirmed הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> And it came to pass as soon as the kingdom בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> that he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants הַמַּכִּ֖ים <S%H5221><s%> which had slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> But the children הַמַּכִּ֖ים <S%H5221><s%> of the murderers לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֵמִ֑ית <S%H4191><s%> he slew כַּכָּת֣וּב <S%H3789><s%> not according unto that which is written בְּסֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book תּֽוֹרַת־ <S%H8451><s%> of the law מֹ֠שֶׁה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> wherein the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יוּמְת֨וּ <S%H4191><s%> shall not be put to death אָב֤וֹת <S%H1><s%> The fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for בָּנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> for the children וּבָנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> nor the children לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יוּמְת֣וּ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for אָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> for the fathers כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> but every man בְּחֶטְא֖וֹ <S%H2399><s%> for his own sin [יָמוּת כ] (יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> shall not be put ק)

הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He הִכָּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> He slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱד֤וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom בְּגֵיא־ <S%H1516><s%> in the valley [הַמֶּלַח כ] (מֶ֙לַח֙ <S%H4417><s%> salt ק) עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וְתָפַ֥שׂ <S%H8610><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסֶּ֖לַע <S%H5554><s%> Selah בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> by war וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמָהּ֙ <S%H8034><s%> the name יָקְתְאֵ֔ל <S%H3371><s%> of it Joktheel עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this פ

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then שָׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֲמַצְיָה֙ <S%H558><s%> Then Amaziah מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹאָ֨שׁ <S%H3060><s%> to Jehoash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹאָחָ֧ז <S%H3059><s%> of Jehoahaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son יֵה֛וּא <S%H3058><s%> of Jehu מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> Come נִתְרָאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> let us look פָנִֽים׃ <S%H6440><s%> one another in the face

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוֹאָ֣שׁ <S%H3060><s%> And Jehoash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <S%H558><s%> to Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָה֮ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying הַח֜וֹחַ <S%H2336><s%> The thistle אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּלְּבָנ֗וֹן <S%H3844><s%> that [was] in Lebanon שָׁ֠לַח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֶ֜רֶז <S%H730><s%> to the cedar אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> that [was] in Lebanon לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying תְּנָֽה־ <S%H5414><s%> Give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּתְּךָ֥ <S%H1323><s%> thy daughter לִבְנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> to my son לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> to wife וַֽתַּעֲבֹ֞ר <S%H5674><s%> and there passed חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> by a wild אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> that [was] in Lebanon וַתִּרְמֹ֖ס <S%H7429><s%> and trode down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H2336><s%> the thistle

הַכֵּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> Thou hast indeed הִכִּ֙יתָ֙ <S%H5221><s%> smitten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> Edom וּֽנְשָׂאֲךָ֖ <S%H5375><s%> hath lifted thee up לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> and thine heart הִכָּבֵד֙ <S%H3513><s%> glory וְשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> [of this] and tarry בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> at home וְלָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why תִתְגָּרֶה֙ <S%H1624><s%> for why shouldest thou meddle בְּרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> to [thy] hurt וְנָ֣פַלְתָּ֔ה <S%H5307><s%> that thou shouldest fall אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you וִיהוּדָ֥ה <S%H3063><s%> [even] thou and Judah עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> would not hear אֲמַצְיָ֔הוּ <S%H558><s%> But Amaziah וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up יְהוֹאָ֤שׁ <S%H3060><s%> Therefore Jehoash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּתְרָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> looked פָנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> one another in the face ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he וַאֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <S%H558><s%> and he and Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בְּבֵ֥ית שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> at Bethshemesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> which [belongeth] to Judah

וַיִּנָּ֥גֶף <S%H5062><s%> was put to the worse יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> and they fled אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man [לְאָהֳלֹו כ] (לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <S%H168><s%> tent ק)

וְאֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲמַצְיָ֨הוּ <S%H558><s%> Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹאָ֣שׁ <S%H3060><s%> And Jehoash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחַזְיָ֗הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah תָּפַ֛שׂ <S%H8610><s%> took יְהוֹאָ֥שׁ <S%H3060><s%> of Jehoash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּבֵ֣ית שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> at Bethshemesh [וַיָּבֹאוּ כ] (וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> abide ק) יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וַיִּפְרֹץ֩ <S%H6555><s%> and brake down בְּחוֹמַ֨ת <S%H2346><s%> the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem בְּשַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> from the gate אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַפִּנָּ֔ה <S%H6438><s%> unto the corner אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

וְלָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַזָּהָב־ <S%H2091><s%> all the gold וְ֠הַכֶּסֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַכֵּלִ֜ים <S%H3627><s%> and all the vessels הַנִּמְצְאִ֣ים <S%H4672><s%> that were found בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God וּבְאֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <S%H214><s%> and in the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted הַתַּֽעֲרֻב֑וֹת <S%H8594><s%> the hostages וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> and returned שֹׁמְרֽוֹנָה׃ <S%H8111><s%> to Samaria

וְיֶתֶר֩ <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֨י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts יְהוֹאָ֜שׁ <S%H3060><s%> of Jehoash אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> which he did וּגְב֣וּרָת֔וֹ <S%H1369><s%> and his might וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and how נִלְחַ֔ם <S%H3898><s%> and how he fought עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with אֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <S%H558><s%> with Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept יְהוֹאָשׁ֙ <S%H3060><s%> And Jehoash עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵר֙ <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> with the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned יָרָבְעָ֥ם <S%H3379><s%> and Jeroboam בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ
